oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Remarks of Senator Edward M. Kennedy at the 1988 Annual Convention of the NAACP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hooks, Benjamin L.; Kennedy, Edward M.; NAACP; speeches;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Transcript of a speech given by Senator Edward M. Kennedy at the Annual Convention of the NAACP on July 14, 1988, in Washington, D.C.
